   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Marxan Server's documentation
=============================

Background
==========
This is the detailed developer documentation for the Marxan Server software. This software provides a set of 
web services to the Marxan Systematic Conservation Planning tool and is used by the Marxan Client web application.
Documentation for the whole system is available at https://docs.marxanweb.org/. 

If you can see this page then the server is running properly. This can be confirmed by clicking on the following link:

https://marxan-server-ny43uciwwa-oc.a.run.app/marxan-server/testTornado

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
